amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research Development by $30,935,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research Development by $30,935,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 235 (Roll no. 381).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 235 (Roll no. 381).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Ms. Speier.
